snippet: The commodities trader announced that it had pushed back the completion date for its $34 billion takeover of the mining company Xstrata amid a review by Chinese authorities.
abstract: The commodities trader announced that it had pushed back the completion date for its $34 billion takeover of the mining company Xstrata amid a review by Chinese authorities.

headline.main: Glencore Extends Deadline for Xstrata Takeover
